entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 2:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Snow level rising to 2000 metres this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Overcast. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
